mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_company( id, parent_id, org_name, org_code, zip_code, link_man, link_phone_num, apply_status, address, email, create_by, update_by, update_date, del_flag, owner, remarks, create_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parentId}, #{orgName}, #{orgCode}, #{zipCode}, #{linkMan}, #{linkPhoneNum}, #{applyStatus}, #{address}, #{email}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{owner}, #{remarks}, #{createDate} )
